remarks: If two lines are comparable, they are equal.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-2012.)
statement:
lncmp.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lncmp.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lncmp.n $e |- N = ( Lines ` K ) $.
lncmp.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
lncmp $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( ( M ` X ) e. N /\ ( M ` Y ) e. N ) ) -> ( X .<_ Y <-> X = Y ) ) $.
